articles.description: MS Dhoni stepped down as CSK captain in IPL 2022 and Ravindra Jadeja was handed the captaincy. However, Jadeja was removed after the team's poor show with Dhoni taking back the leadership role once again.
articles.content:
Chennai Super Kings (Image Source: Twitter)
